summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North 70th Street, as established by Ordinance No. 42799, from Fremont Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7315, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
